Translations.Text: Nnan wid ur nessarem ara timlilit yidne£: "a lemmer id ssersen lmalayek $uone$, ne$ nwala Mass nne$"! Ni$ sme$woen aias iman nnsen, u ffuhrin aias
Ass ideg ara walin lmalayek, ur ippili wassen d abecceo ibe$wviyen, s lxio. A d inin: d aedid ur nepwazgar
Nezzi $eo igiten nnsen, Nerra ten d a$ebbao immebruzzaen
Imawlan n Loennet, assen, di tnezdu$t akked trusi iufraren
Ass ideg ara iceqqeq igenni s usigna, ideg ara d ssersen lmalayek, ta deffir ta
tagelda, assen, tidep, i Uenin. D ass uwaio i ijehliyen
Ass ideg ara i$eee umednus ifassen is, ad yini: "a yamxix iw, a lemmer ddi$ d ubrid Umazan
A tawa$it pwa$e$, a lemmer ur rri$ ara winnat d aebib
Ni$ itelf iyi seg usmekti i illan iusa yi d. Cciian, i umdan, izga d axeddaa
Inna Umazan: "a Mass iw! Ar ugdud iw, s tidep, Leqwoan agi d askeofee
Akka, i yal nnbi, Nefka acengu seg ibe$wviyen. Iqadd Mass ik, i nnhaya akked usellek
Nnan wid ijehlen: "a lemmer i s d ssersen Leqwoan, deg yiwet n tikelt"! Akka, iwakken a Ntebbet ul ik, yis. Nesemderri t d idurra
Ur ak d ppawin amedya, mebla ma Nuzen ak d tidep, akked ufesser amxallef
Wid ara ipwafesren af udmawen nnsen, ar Loahennama, widak d at umkan n dir mavi, d at ubrid im$eooeq mavi
Ni$ Nefka yas Tazmamt i Musa, u Nerna $uoes gma s, Haoun, d am²aiwen
Nenna: "oueet ar ugdud i inekoen issekniyen nne£". Nhudd iten qeccuc meccuc
Agdud n Nue, mi nekoen imazanen, Ne$ves iten, u Nerra ten d assekni i medden. Nhegga i imednas aaaqeb aqeoean
Aad, Tamud, At Ooas, u aias isuta garasen
I yal wa, Nefka imedyaten. Yal wa, Neoea t wakali
Ni$ aaddan $ef taddart i$ef id i$li ugeffur ageswae. Day qqimen ur p walan ara? Xaii, ur ssaramen ara tanekra
Mi k walan, ppemsexxioen kan fellak: "day d wagi id Iuzen Oebbi, d Amazan
Qoib i $ itlef seg ioebbiten nne$, lemmer ur neubio fellasen". Deqqal ad eoen mara walin aaaqeb, anwa i innetlafen, kteo, seg ubrid
Twalav win i irran lhawiyya s d oebbi s? Day ad as tiliv, kecc, d awkil
Day t$ilev tegwti, segsen, sellen ne$ fehmen? Nitni am lmal kan, aaer $elben ten akken nnetlafen seg ubrid
Ma twalav Mass ik, amek id Ifka tili? Lemmer i S ihwi, Irra p d tusbii. D$a Nefka yas itij d ppbut
Sinna, Njebd ip id $uone£, ajbad isehlen
D Neppa i wen Irran iv d aceiiiv, ives d areyyee, u Irra ass d tanekra
D Neppa i wen d Iuznen avu, d abecceo s ueunu S. Nessers ed, seg igenni, aman iufan
iwakken a Neeyu yissen tamurt immuten; a Nessew yissen aias seg wid id Nexleq n lmal, akked imdanen
Ni$ Nfeoq iten garasen, iwakken a d mmektin. Tegwti n yimdanen ugin; atnan kan di tijehli
Lemmer i £ ihwi, yili Nuzen aneddao, i yal tamdint
Ur ppa$ awal i ijehliyen. Nna$ iten yis, amennu$ ameqwoan
